purpose: The email announces a call for papers (CfP) for a special issue of the Information and Software Technology journal focused on 'Next-Generation Model-Based Software Engineering with Foundation Models.' It invites researchers to submit original, unpublished work related to the intersection of model-based software engineering and foundation models, with a submission deadline of May 31, 2025. The email outlines the topics of interest and provides submission instructions and contact information for guest editors.
evidence_sentences: This special issue of the Information and Software Technology journal aims to provide a venue for researchers to present insights, experiences, innovations, and solutions at the intersection of model-based software engineering and foundation models.

This special issue solicits the application of well-founded FMs, e.g., pre trained models or large language models, to MBE and the related sub-fields such as model-driven engineering (MDE), model-driven development (MDD), and model-driven architecture (MDA).
Papers submitted to the Special Issue should present original, unpublished work, relevant to one of its topics, outlined below.
Papers should be submitted through the Editorial Manager (EM) site of IST journal: https://edu.lu/xpnxj.
